events.description: when page changes via user interaction or programmatically

args.description: Selected page number (starting with 1), or null if no page found

events.description: when page changes via user interaction

slots.name: first-text
slots.description: The "go to first page" button text (html/sub-components supported)

slots.name: prev-text
slots.description: The "go to previous page" button text (html/sub-components supported)

slots.name: next-text
slots.description: The "go to next page" button text (html/sub-components supported)

slots.name: last-text
slots.description: The "go to last page" button text (html/sub-components supported)

slots.name: page
slots.description: Scoped slot for page button text. Scoped props: page - page number, content - string of page number or pageGen result, active - true if page is active
